channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NSF and Micron invest in STEM teacher training to support future microelectronics workforce

item.title: Methane emissions are rising faster than ever

item.title: Lakes in marginalized communities sampled less, study finds

item.title: New AI can ID brain patterns related to specific behavior

item.title: This week with NSF Director Panchanathan

item.title: Giant fanged frog went unrecognized in Philippines because it was nearly identical to even larger species
item.description: Researchers published findings describing a new species of fanged frog, named Limnonectes cassiopeia, from the Philippine island of Luzon.

item.title: A window into the body: groundbreaking technique makes skin transparent

item.title: Weather anomaly experienced in the McMurdo Dry Valleys
item.description: The McMurdo Dry Valleys are a unique region of Antarctica, nearly devoid of snow and ice. An atmospheric river event in March 2022 led to record warm ...

item.title: New research sinks an old theory for the doldrums, a low-wind equatorial region that stranded sailors for centuries
